text: @ChargerJeff @NBCSNorthwest @tcbbiggs @owlhix @TheJakeMcGrady @farouq1 An Insider is someone who has contact with players, coaches, GMs, owners, agents, etc (something none of us have), & whose job is to get you the stories behind the scenes. That is not us, thus, Outsiders. But what's in a name anyway? Check the show out & hopefully you enjoy it.

Team Mom, a.k.a @tcbbiggs is dropping by to join @owlhix, @TheJakeMcGrady, and @CBurkhardtNBCS on Blazers Outsiders tonight!
We'll look ahead to the road trip, talk about the rest of the season, and of course plenty of @farouq1 😉 
#RipCity  
⏰ 7pm
📱 https://t.co/AyK6fKCkaj https://t.co/JLHjborn59
